text: 12.31: Mk 3.28-29 naŋga, Lu 12.10 naŋga, Sɨ 7.51 naŋga, 1 Ti 1.13 naŋga, Hi 6.4-6 naŋga, 10.26 naŋga, 1 Jo 5.16Kamataharɨm narɨŋ yi ambin, krunavundi muhɨmɨmuhɨm ñamba vanavana andɨrɨmandɨyu, naŋga Gotɨŋ ambasuvɨrɨmandɨyu haŋɨnɨŋ, Got kuŋgɨ kuyɨvɨrɨmandɨ. Hara kru Gotɨndu Mavɨñɨŋiŋ ambasuvɨrɨmandɨ hamandu kuŋgɨ, Got maŋguyɨvɨrɨmandɨ.
